entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
